name: m: Kimi wo Tsutaete
overview: M [Emu] - Kimi Wo Tsutaete is a dating simulation game also released for the Sega Saturn console. In the game the player takes the role of a japanese high school student and will live his life from September until December and will have to find love meeting different girls of his school. Depending of the player choices and action during the game the diary colour will change according to the change in the feelings of the characters about the player's character. The game features 3 main female characters and different endings depending of the player choices during the game.
